CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: [26][27][28][29] However , since low band - gap DPP - based copolymers usually exhibit a relatively high - lying highest occupied molecular orbital ( HOMO ) energy level , leading to a low open circuit voltage ( V OC ) of PSCs , a compromise between the band - gap and the HOMO energy level of DPP - based polymers is critically required.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| low band-gap DPP-based copolymers |
| a high lying highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) energy level |
| PSCs (which could refer to Polymer Solar Cells) |
| DPP-based polymers |
| the band-gap |
| the HOMO energy level of DPP-based polymers |

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| low band-gap DPP-based copolymers |
| DPP-based polymers |

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: [26][27][28][29] However , since low band - gap DPP - based copolymers usually exhibit a relatively high - lying highest occupied molecular orbital ( HOMO ) energy level , leading to a low open circuit voltage ( V OC ) of PSCs , a compromise between the band - gap and the HOMO energy level of DPP - based polymers is critically required.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| low band-gap |
| highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) energy level |
| open circuit voltage (V OC) |

The entities are identified as "low band-gap", "highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) energy level", and "open circuit voltage (V OC)".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| low band-gap |
| highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) energy level |

The entities "low band-gap" and "highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) energy level" clearly refer to material properties. The entity "open circuit voltage (V OC)" is a device property, not a material property, so it has been removed.
